config.translatorpp.source_language.tool: The language to translate from. Set to 'auto' to detect automatically.
config.translatorpp.translation_tool.too: The translation client tool to use for translating text.
config.translatorpp.openai_model.tooltip: The AI model to use for translation. (e.g., gpt-4o-mini, gemini-2.0-flash)
config.translatorpp.openai_apikey.toolti: Your OpenAI API key for authentication.
config.translatorpp.openai_baseurl.toolt: The API to receive requests from OpenAI client. (AI model provider)
misc.translatorpp.translation.failed.cha:
Translation got an error code 400.
Cause: Invalid Authentication
Solution: Ensure the correct API key and requesting organization are being used.

Translation got an error code 401.
Cause: The requesting API key is not correct.
Solution: Ensure the API key used is correct or generate a new one.

Translation got an error code 401.
Cause: Your account is not part of an organization.
Solution: Contact OpenAI service to get added to a new organization or ask your organization manager to invite you to an organization.

Translation got an error code 403.
Cause: You are accessing the API from an unsupported country, region, or territory.
Solution: Please see supported countries and territories page for more information.

Translation got an error code 404.
Cause: Model does not exist or you do not have access to it.
Solution: Ensure the correct model is being used.

Translation an got error code 429.
Cause: You are sending requests too quickly.
Solution: Pace your requests. Read https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/rate-limits

Translation got an error code 429.
Cause: You have run out of credits or hit your maximum monthly spend.
Solution: Buy more credits or increase your limits.

Translation got an error code 500.
Cause: Issue on our servers.
Solution: Retry your request after a brief wait and contact us if the issue persists. Check the https://status.openai.com

Translation got an error code 503.
Cause: Our servers are experiencing high traffic.
Solution: Please retry your requests after a brief wait.

Translation got an error code 503.
Cause: A sudden increase in your request rate is impacting service reliability.
Solution: Please reduce your request rate to its original level, maintain a consistent rate for at least 15 minutes, and then gradually increase it.
